tutorial.title: Voice Assistant Tutorial
tutorial.step1: Tap the microphone button to start speaking
tutorial.step2: Speak clearly in your preferred language
tutorial.step3: Wait for the system to process your request
tutorial.step4: Listen to the response or read the transcription

tips.title: Tips for Better Recognition
tips.tip1: Speak clearly and at normal pace
tips.tip4: Wait for the beep before speaking
